casebody.data:
No. 10-8791. Thomas P. Richard, Petitioner v. Michael Wenerowicz, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution at Graterford. 563 U.S. 1004, 131 S. Ct. 2484,

179 L. Ed. 2d 1240,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3574. May 16, 2011.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 563 U.S. 921, 131 S. Ct. 1821, 179 L. Ed. 2d 779, 2011 U.S. LEXIS 2748.
